title: Calligraphy in Running Script
description: fourteen lines of calligraphy; first six lines are written with slightly larger characters; remaining eight lines are smaller, and more closely spaced; signature at far L, overlapping large square intaglio seal; smaller rectangular intaglio seal at R center edge
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
